sentences.en: Elias : I lost my pet dinosaur.
sentences.cn: 我把我的宠物恐龙丢了.

sentences.en: Elias callsonce a month from lsrael to see if she got his money for '' child support ''.
sentences.cn: 埃利阿斯 每个月从以色列打次电话,来看看她是否有钱捐给儿童支援.

sentences.en: Elias knew no way to wealth but the slow and sure one.
sentences.cn: 伊莱斯除了慢而稳的生财之道以外,其他的一窍不通.

sentences.en: Elias Sory is the director general of health services in Ghana.
sentences.cn: 伊莱亚斯·索瑞是加纳健康服务的处长。

sentences.en: Elias toyed with his own gold goblet, scuffing it along the crescent - shaped scars in the oak.
sentences.cn: Elias把玩着他自己的黄金的酒杯, 沿着橡木桌上的新月形的疤,磨着.

sentences.en: Elias turned his green gaze downward to the little man.
sentences.cn: Elias绿色的目光注视着这个个子矮小的人.

sentences.en: Elias Zerhouni, spoke at the awards ceremony in New York City.
sentences.cn: 伊莱亚斯? 塞霍尼 在纽约市举行的颁奖仪式上发言.

sentences.en: He's dying! Did Elias do that to him? Does the king know?
sentences.cn: “他快死了! 是Elias对他做的这些事 吗 ?国王知道 吗 ?”.

sentences.en: In Great Britain Elias Ahmole ( 1617 - 1692 ) was the forerunner.
sentences.cn: 在英国,伊莱亚斯·阿摩尔 ( 1617-1692 ) 是先驱者.

sentences.en: Isgrimnur thought of Miriamele, Elias'pretty, melancholy child.
sentences.cn: Isgrimnur想起Miriamele, Elias漂亮的忧郁的孩子.

sentences.en: King Elias'eyes glinted, and a tiny throb began between the strong cords of his neck.
sentences.cn: Elias目光闪烁,脖子上的血管间, 有了细微的抽动.

sentences.en: President Elias Hrawi of Lebanon was at the White House at a tense moment in the Middle East.
sentences.cn: 在中东局势紧张的时刻，黎巴嫩总统埃利亚斯·赫拉维正在白宫。

sentences.en: The combatants were unequally matched. Elias was anger, Cornelis spiteful.
sentences.cn: 争斗的双方是力量悬殊的.伊莱亚斯怒气冲冲, 科内利斯则居心叵测.

sentences.en: Their second child, Elias, was born on 4 September 1999.
sentences.cn: 1999年9月4日,他们的二儿子埃利亚斯出生.

sentences.en: There are those who say he is Elias.
sentences.cn: 还有人说他就是伊莱亚斯呢。

sentences.en: They say Elias smashed the jar on the counter.
sentences.cn: 他们说埃利阿斯把罐子砸到柜台上.

sentences.en: We're revamping the '' Elias Creations'' sign.
sentences.cn: 我们在修补 埃利阿斯 作品那个标志.
